tool_description: An API where you can request information about IPs. There are also some bulk endpoints to request multiple IPs with a call
name: Bulk IP Details
title: Bulk IP Details

api_list.name: Bulk IP Details - Max 50 IPs
api_list.description: Get details about bulk IPs with a single call! Specify all IPs with comma separated
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bulk-ip-details.p.rapidapi.com/api/IP/bulk50/149.182.176.152,129.245.60.97,252.192.217.209,183.77.9.148"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bulk-ip-details.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bulk-ip-details.p.rapidapi.com/api/IP/bulk50/{ip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bulk-ip-details.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
